description: Calculates the ratios of analyte concentrations between antibody-treated samples and a selected control. The analysis includes: calculation of the median concentration across replicates, min-max scaling of the concentrations across major sample groups, and finally calculation of the ratios and plotting of the median ratios across donors.
name: iTeos multiplex immunoassay template workflow

steps.name: Calculate median and mad across replicates
Median & mad barplot per sample group

factors.name: Measurement
factors.description:
Select the values to use in the computation.

Example:
* cyto.value or, 
* Calc. Concentration

factors.name: Variable
factors.description:
Select the analytes name.

Example:
* cyto.variable or, 
* Assay

factors.name: Group
factors.description:
Select factors that describe the different sample groups (multiple factors can be selected).
Commonly used factors: sample source name, antibody condition, antibody concentration antibody and donor

factors.name: Supergroup
factors.description:
Select an attribute to color the barplots accordingly. 

Example: antibody treatment

steps.name: Calculate median and mad concentrations across replicates
Calculate median and mad across replicates
Median & mad barplot per sample group

factors.name: Measurement
factors.description:
Select the values to use in the computation.

Example:
* ratio.fc.ratio

factors.name: Variable
factors.description:
Select the analytes name.

Example:
* analyte (ratio.ctrl..variable)

factors.name: Group
factors.description:
Select factors that describe the different sample groups (multiple factors can be selected).
Commonly used factors: sample source name, antibody condition, antibody concentration antibody. 
 In this case donor should be left out.

factors.name: Supergroup
factors.description:
Select an attribute to color the barplots accordingly. 

Example: antibody treatment

defaultFactors.name: Measurement
defaultFactors.description:
Select the values to use in the computation.

Example:
* ratio.fc.ratio

defaultFactors.name: Variable
defaultFactors.description:
Select the analytes name.

Example:
* analyte (ratio.ctrl..variable)

defaultFactors.name: Group
defaultFactors.description:
Select factors that describe the different sample groups (multiple factors can be selected).
Commonly used factors: sample source name, antibody condition, antibody concentration antibody. 
 In this case donor should be left out.

defaultFactors.name: Supergroup
defaultFactors.description:
Select an attribute to color the barplots accordingly. 

Example: antibody treatment

factors.name: Measurement
factors.description:
Select the values to use in the computation.

Example: median concentration (median_mad.rep.median)

factors.name: Supergroup
factors.description:
Select the major divisions of the sample groups.

Multiple factors can be selected.

Example:
* sample source name (median_mad.rep..sample source name)
* antibody condition (median_mad.rep..antibody condition)
* donor (median_mad.rep..donor)

factors.name: Variable
factors.description:
Select the analytes name.

Example:
* analyte (median_mad.rep..variable)

factors.name: Observation
factors.description:
Select the factor that defines different observations within a major sample group.

For example: antibody treatment (median_mad.rep..antibody)

defaultFactors.name: Measurement
defaultFactors.description:
Select the values to use in the computation.

Example: median concentration (median_mad.rep.median)

factors.description:

factors.description:

* antibody condition (scale_min_max.smm..antibody condition)

factors.name: Pair
factors.description:
Select the factor that pairs measurements within the sample groups.

For example: Donor (scale_min_max.smm..donor)

factors.name: Group
factors.description:
Select the factor that define different observations within a major sample group.

For example: antibody treatment (scale_min_max.smm..antibody)

steps.name: Median ratio barplot with mad error bars

factors.name: Measurement
factors.description:
Select the values to use in the computation.

Example: median ratio (median_ratio.rep0.median)

factors.name: Group
factors.description:
Select the factor that defines different observations within a major sample group.

For example: antibody treatment (median_ratio.rep0..antibody)

factors.name: Measurement2
factors.description:
Select the statistic to use as an error bar for the median ratio barplots.

For example: mad (median_ratio.rep0.mad)

factors.description:
Select the analytes name.

Example:
* analyte (median_ratio.rep0..variable)

factors.name: Supergroup
factors.description:

Multiple factors can be selected.

* antibody condition (median_ratio.rep0..antibody condition)
